issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Support ltrim, rtrim
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11138](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11138). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Hello!

 

Support for trim was already done, but will great to support ltrim and rtrim

 

Thanks
